original_text: And the battle continued that day, and the king was propped up in his chariot facing the Syrians, until at evening he died. And the blood of the wound flowed into the bottom of the chariot.
korean_text: 이 날에 전쟁이 맹렬하였으므로 왕이 병거 가운데에 붙들려 서서 아람 사람을 막다가 저녁에 이르러 죽었는데 상처의 피가 흘러 병거 바닥에 고였더라

sentences.original_text: And the battle continued that day
and the king was propped up in his chariot
sentences.korean_translation: 왕은 그의 전차에 버티어 세워져 있었고

sentences.original_text: And the blood of the wound
flowed into the bottom of the chariot
